Package bg.x2d

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Background
    Objects of type Background define a Paint or Graphics2D object as a standard to be used among other 2DX objects when repainting frames.
    ImageUtils
    Provides static convenience methods for performing geometric operations on images.
    Local
    A convenience class consisting entirely of static methods regarding system information.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ImageUtils.ScaleQuality  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TDXException
    Generic exception thrown by classes in the 2DX software when internal errors occur.
